segments.text: Yes . My car is having problems .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you want me to take a look ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , thank you . I think I can handle it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you change your mind , let me know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will . Thanks . That's sweet of you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I might need some tools though . Do you know where I can get some ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I have all kinds of tools . Just ask . I ’ ll be happy to get them for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . That would be very helpful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anything for you . Seriously , I don ’ t mind helping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . If you really insist , I could always use the company .
segments.speaker: S2
